name: Tunneler (Codster177)
description:
You've recently been hired as a mining scout for the local power plant. Radioactive fossil fuels are what keeps this society of bacteria going - in their microscopic city of the future. 

You've accepted this job as a way of earning some quick cash. After all, its just you in these crazy tunnels.

Document the location of all the ore you can find, and try not to hurt yourself with your company-grade shotgun.

Q to use scanner.

Right click to equip shotgun.

Credits:

Cody Taylor - All assets and coding.

Melanie Najera - Menu and thumbnail art.

Kai Ford - All music and sound effects.

This game was made in under a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 If you enjoy, don't forget to rate the game!
